name: Pixling World
detailed_description:
Pixling World is a living, breathing ecosystem of tens of thousands of virtual plants and animals called Pixlings. The appearances and behaviors of the Pixlings evolve as they are all competing for survival, just as in nature. Your role is that of an alien scientist and gardener, who is exploring the creatures and trying to stimulate them to evolve in the most interesting ways. Together with a community of other scientists, we are all searching for the most exciting new lifeforms.

Some of the things you can enjoy in this game:

  • Real darwinian evolution.
  • Hundreds of thousands of creatures in a single world.
  • The latest from artificial intelligence research used to power and evolve their brains.
  • A complex environment with a realistic water cycle including evaporation, rain and groundwater.
  • A community of other players, all collaborating to find the most interesting creatures.

short_description: Pixling World is a living, breathing ecosystem of virtual plants and animals, whose appearances and behaviors evolve as they are competing for survival. You join a community of alien scientists & gardeners, exploring the creatures and stimulating them to evolve in the most interesting ways.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb Video Memory, capable of supporting WebGL 2.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb Video Memory, capable of supporting WebGL 2.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb Video Memory, capable of supporting WebGL 2.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
